phrases: What are you going to do?!
You have not made any progress whatsoever with Ichijou-kun yet!
I just do not understand how you can be so spineless.
After all the help I gave you, after you got all those chances,
how can you possibly not make any progress?
I wish you would take the initiative to try asking him out yourself once in a while.
Well, not that I think you are capable of such a thing, Kosaki-chan.
But at this rate, you will never get anywhere.
You see, the thing is, tomorrow...
I invited Ichijou-kun to my house.
Um, do you... have any plans this weekend?
Are you free, by any chance?
D-Do not tell me she is about to ask me out!
I wanted to ask if you could take on a part-time job.
Oh, it is just a job.
You see, one of our employees has an emergency and cannot come in.
My mom said it would be best to find someone who is a good cook.
And so, since you are the only one I know who can cook...
Here I was, thinking that I would not be seeing Onodera for a while because of summer vacation...
I have never had a part-time job before,
but today I am going to show Onodera my good side!
I sure have not been to Japanese Sweets Onodera in a while.
You do not have a single product in stock?
Make sure you have it by this evening!
I will head over there myself to pick it up later.
We should be okay as far as baked goods go,
but what am I going to do about the raw sweets?
What is a student doing in my shop?
I was wondering who it could be when you said you knew a great cook.
But it is just one of your classmates?
Not to mention, he is kind of a bean sprout.
What I was looking for was someone who I could throw to the dogs with no problem, you know?
Ordinarily, the kitchen is a professional's sacred realm.
To even think that a mere high school student can cook...
But Ichijou-kun's not like that at all!
I will have you know that Ichijou-kun cooks his family's meals by himself, every single day!
And we are talking about a ton of food!
Enough for dozens of people, all by himself!
Why do not you whip something up, then?
I will determine whether or not you are up to the job.
If it is no good, I will send you packing.
Well, I did take a crash course in Japanese sweets,
but that does not mean I can pass...
Give it all you have got, Ichijou-kun!
He is wiping the condensation off the bowl to be thorough.
It looks like he does not have a clue about Japanese sweets,
but he is no newbie when it comes to cooking.
Did you say your name was Ichijou-kun?
Hey, at first I was not so sure,
but you brought home a surprisingly worthy man, did not you?
Ichijou-kun's not really that kind of
You are always spacing out, so I was starting to worry!
But this kid, he is got what it takes,
and he will make a great heir to the family business, do not you think?
I told you, it is not like that!
Well, we can talk about it later.
I guess I can kind of trust him now.
Kosaki, show him how to make bean jam paste and the easiest sweets.
I will be in the shop till noon.
You should see your face when you are in front of a guy!
Not only that, but to took this opportunity to introduce me to a guy.
That mother of yours is something else.
I am going to show you some stuff.
You add some granulated sugar to this dough over here...
But really, Onodera, I cannot believe you remember every little step.
I guess you help out a lot, making stuff like this, right?
I do not actually get to make anything.
I am pretty awful at it.
Ever since I was little, I have always thought it looked fun, so I watched.
Well, they did let me try making some myself one time, but...
Everyone who ate my sweets ended up keeling over,
and the shop was shut down for three days!
She is had her deadly touch forever, then!
But the one thing I did get praised for was my finishing touches,
and since I have been helping with that all this time, it is become my area of expertise.
You perfect the taste, Ichijou-kun, and I will perfect the shape.
That way we will make some great Japanese sweets!
Y-You want me to marry into this family?
I am stepping out for a bit, so watch over the shop!
Hey, just look at us now!
Can you believe the great vibe we have got going on?
I almost want to stay here forever and start a family!
So you are holding down the fort today, Kosaki-chan?
You certainly have a good memory!
How about we go on a date sometime, you and I?
Your change comes out to 615 yen.
Flirting around like that at his age!
Do you still go out on dates with Chitoge-chan?
What theWhy would I go out with her?!
I mean, we are going out and all...
I guess you have not heard.
I know that you two are not really boyfriend and girlfriend.
Chitoge-chan told me quite a while ago.
I was sure that you already knew.
If you are going to tell Onodera, then let me know, damn it!
That is why he acted like he was in a relationship even when we were alone.
But then, why would he hide that photo?
Onodera knew all this time that we were not dating?
Then does that mean I am in the clear to tell her how I feel about her now?
No, no, hold on a second!
No way it is that simple!
Got To get the timing right too and all...
Seems like it is gotten really windy outside, huh?
Come to think of it, they just said on the news that a typhoon was coming.
It is starting to come down.
I wonder if your mom is all right.
She says she cannot make it back because the weather's too bad.
And to look after the shop...
Well, I can understand why, though.
It would be too dangerous for you to go home,
so I should have you stay the night.
She wants me to stay the night?
Me, spend the night at Onodera's?
B-But... Onodera, is not there anyone else home?
Dad had some business to take care of and will not be coming home.
My little sister lives in a dorm.
Can I really stay the night here?
I cannot just spend the night at a girl's house alone with her.
Sorry, but can I borrow an umbrella?
I can handle a little drizzle on my own.
The roof tiles are coming down!
Better not wander around outside too much!
Rather, how does Onodera feel right now?
She is got to be uneasy about this, right?
What am I going to do?
Just knowing that we were going to work together was almost too much for me to handle!
I cannot stop my face from going slack!
You cannot let him see you looking so pathetic!
Um, so what do you think we should do, Ichijou-kun?
There was this really funny TV show on yesterday,
What am I going to do?
I cannot hide it at all!
Okay, why do not we talk it over and decide?
Come up to my room, and
Did I really say something so audacious?
Are you really okay with that?
Letting me come up to your room?
Because it is n-nothing special, okay?
Let me tidy it up a little!
And I also want to change!
Do not rush on my account, okay?
Guess I will go with this!
I have never been in a girl's bedroom before.
Who would have thought Onodera's would be the first?
Just make yourself at home, all right?
And it totally smells great, too!
Oh, I will be back with some tea.
The bed that Onodera sleeps in every night...
Hell, this is where she just changed...
You will lose all sense of reason!
Is this a photo of Onodera's crush?
I know I should not look at it...
No, of course I cannot look at it!
I have brought us some tea
Want to play a word-chain game?
It is still too early for that!
That is what you do when you have completely run out of things to talk about!
It is a graveyard where conversations go to die!
I guess suddenly being thrown into such a situation is pretty nerve-wracking.
Normally, I would not have any problem talking to you.
Onodera's struggling just as much as I am!
I got to man up and find the right topic...
Do you have your yearbook from junior high, maybe?
That might be the most surefire topic of them all, but hey, at least it will get the conversation going.
This really brings back memories, does not it?
Just six months ago, we were junior high students.
I wonder what you call this feeling.
The ball game tournament when we were first-years!
That was when I got to be friends with Ruri-chan.
You and I have been in the same class since we were second-years.
Although it was not till the third year that we actually started talking...
Man, even as a junior high student she was adorable.
I got to give myself props!
No matter how tiny she is, I can always spot Onodera.
I guess that makes me a little happy.
I am not in any of these photos, am I?
Oh, and look, there you are again!
I cannot believe you spotted such tiny images!
Well, it is because you stand out, Ichijou-kun.
I mean you were popular with the girls, were not you?
If anyone was popular, it was you!
Not me, by a long shot!
It is because you are really nice, Ichijou-kun!
It just might be that you have not realized it yourself, you know.
When I was in junior high,
I knew at least one girl who had a crush on you.
You cannot just say that and not tell me!
We have already graduated, so it does not matter, right?
Not unless that girl gives me permission.
Oh, well, we actually go way back.
We have not been able to get rid of each other since kindergarten.
You know, actually, talking to Onodera is really fun.
If only this moment could last forever and ever.
Typhoon No. 16 has swerved way off its original course,
and is now heading towards the sea to the east.
Cannot you take a hint at all?
Right, then I will be heading home after all.
It is not right for a guy and a girl to spend the night alone in a house.
I want to spend the night!
I want to talk with her some more!
Are not you going to stop me from going?
It would be kind of weird for you to stay when it is stopped raining.
I had such a great time!
I wonder... when I will get to see her next.
That part-time job was only for today,
and it is still summer vacation.
Well, come to think of it, you and I...
We talk a lot at school, but now that I think about it, we do not
know each other's e-mail addresses, do we?
Now that you mention it, we do not.
Okay, why do not we exchange them now?
Hold on a second, I am going to set up the infrared.
Sure you do not mind, Onodera?
I am so happy that I built up the courage to ask!
I never expected Ichijou-kun to ask me.
Things have been going so great today, divine punishment could be waiting for me!
I had such a good time today.
When will I get to see him again?
When we were in junior high,
the girl who liked you was...
All right, see you later, Ichijou-kun.
Call me anytime you need my help again!
Nearly two years after we met, I finally got her e-mail address!
Would it be too shameless to send her a text right now?
I am sure we both had a blast talking, and I want to keep talking to her more than anything right now!
Do not tell me that us having a blast was just my imagination!
I did great today, did not I?
